content.text: I remember sitting on my grandmother's porch, eating fresh-baked cookies and drinking lemonade.
That sounds so sweet. I love fresh-baked cookies.
I'm a Game of Thrones fan who worries about my mom's health.
I'm worried about my kids getting sick because of the cold weather.
I'm sorry. I hope your kids stay healthy.
Thank you. I hope your mom gets better.
Thank you. I'm sure she will.
I often spend my free time engaging in activism work with friends and family.
That's really cool. I wish I had more time to do activism work.
It's a lot of fun. I love helping people.
I met my birth mother when I was sixteen.
That must have been a really special experience.
It was. It was really nice to finally meet her.
That sounds really cool. I've always wanted to drive a mustang.
It's a lot of fun. I love driving it
